title: Feature: The Ten Worst (Or Best) Frank Turner Tattoos
body:
Frank Turner fan? Hey, maybe you should get a tattoo of his lyrics and upload it to the dedicated [Frank Turner Tattoos Facebook Page](https://www.facebook.com/FrankTurnerTattoos/photos_stream). I’m not here to judge his music, but I admire the dedication of his fans. Kudos. Here’s a selection of the best Frank Turner related tattoos.

[![539860_587644507929583_675954234_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/539860_587644507929583_675954234_n.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/539860_587644507929583_675954234_n.jpg)

Hold on a second, gonna take me a while to read this one.

[![10893_587640047930029_37091424_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/10893_587640047930029_37091424_n.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/10893_587640047930029_37091424_n.jpg)

I think that’s a Monster Energy drink tattoo.

[![312309_587639987930035_1695895244_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/312309_587639987930035_1695895244_n.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/312309_587639987930035_1695895244_n.jpg)Let’s get matching Frank Turner tattoos to show our undying love for each other.

[![521272_587049921322375_1582383734_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/521272_587049921322375_1582383734_n.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/521272_587049921322375_1582383734_n.jpg)

Awww, another matchy one.

[![1849_587639877930046_1942698626_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/1849_587639877930046_1942698626_n.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/1849_587639877930046_1942698626_n.jpg)

I guess the irony is that, when standing in the sea, this tattoo won’t be visible.

[![382244_587639524596748_1722948125_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/382244_587639524596748_1722948125_n.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/382244_587639524596748_1722948125_n.jpg)

Rig Obert Song would have worked better, personally.

[![559740_587639517930082_2002875159_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/559740_587639517930082_2002875159_n.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/559740_587639517930082_2002875159_n.jpg)

Blogging is my substitute for love.

[![253108_587639167930117_1789575332_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/253108_587639167930117_1789575332_n.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/253108_587639167930117_1789575332_n.jpg)

If anyone asks if you’re going to hell, this tattoo comes in handy.

[![537110_587057041321663_828102400_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/537110_587057041321663_828102400_n.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/537110_587057041321663_828102400_n.jpg)Maybe there’s irony in the fact that so many people have this line tattooed on them.

[![543893_587056777988356_1167912251_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/543893_587056777988356_1167912251_n.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/543893_587056777988356_1167912251_n.jpg)

The only thing that’s left to do is get a Frank Turner tattoo.

I’m not here to judge his music, but I admire the dedication of his fans. Kudos. Here’s a selection of the best Frank Turner related tattoos.   Hold on a second, \[…\]
